message: Hello Bob, I am offering you the product for $120. I believe this price reflects its value while allowing us to reach an agreeable transaction.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $120 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. After considering our previous discussions, I am willing to sell the product for $110. I hope this proposal works for you.
